document.full_text: tony hale is probably best known for his nimble work as "arrested development's" buster bluth, an over-coddled man-child with a penchant for giving horribly awkward shoulder massages.
document.title: "arrested development" star resurfaces in indie
lines_and_colors: tony hale is probably best known for his nimble work as "arrested development's" buster bluth, an over-coddled man-child with a penchant for giving horribly awkward shoulder massages.
